verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--"kṛṣṇa muñi ekhana-i pāinu
āpanāra durdaive punaḥ hārāinu

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; muñi—I; ekhana-i—just now; pāinu—had; āpanāra—My own; durdaive—by misfortune; punaḥ—again; hārāinu—I have lost.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then said, "I just now had Kṛṣṇa, but unfortunately I have lost Him again.
